pages.resources.title: Resources
pages.association.title: Catalan association Les Quatre Barres
pages.association.box1.title: How to become a member
pages.association.box1.text1: Anyone can become a member of Les Quatre Barres, a Catalan cultural association established in the city of Stockholm. The association promotes the cultural values of the Catalan Countries among Catalans residing in the Nordic countries, making them known within this geographical area in order to promote communication and cultural exchange.

pages.association.box1.list.item-1.subti: Enter your details as well as those of your family

pages.association.box1.list.item-3.subti: Once filled out you will find the information to make the payment
pages.user-login.title: Login
pages.user-join.title: Join the human towers
pages.user-join.subtitle: Membership application
pages.user-join.form.checkbox-image: The Castellers d'Estocolm reserve the right to use pictures and videos of rehearsals and shows including participants to publish them on the Internet either in websites or social networks and in promotional material and others in order to promote the group. Therefore, I (as myself or the guardian of the member of this application) give my consent that this material can be used internally or externally.
pages.user-join.form.checkbox-image-chil: The Castellers d'Estocolm reserve the right to use pictures and videos of rehearsals and shows including participants to publish them on the Internet either in websites or social networks and in promotional material and others in order to promote the group. Therefore, I (as the guardian of the member) give my consent that this material can be used internally or externally. Note that this is completely optional. If left unchecked the Castellers d'Estocolm will try their best to protect the identity of the member by blurring their face in external publications.
pages.user-join.form.checkbox-responsibi: I understand that building human towers is a risk activity that requires a good physical condition. Therefore, I assure that I (or the person whom I am the guardian for) am/is in a good physical condition and do/es not have any personal health problem that will not allow to participate in the rehearsals or shows. I accept to communicate any mental or physical condition that could have an impact in my/their personal safety as well as in the one of others. Furthermore, I understand that it is necessary to have an active role in other to prevent accidents and that any injury product of rehearsals or shows in relation to the group is not the group's responsibility. The Castellers d'Estocolm reserve the right to not allow to participate anyone who does not respect this condition or any of the safety guidelines as well as for any other unsafe or not appropriate behaviour.
pages.user-join.form.checkbox-processing: I give my consent to the Castellers d'Estocolm and to the Casal Les Quatre Barres in order to process the personal data that I have provided in this form. Moreover, I give my consent to the Castellers d'Estocolm and to the Casal Les Quatre Barres to send me emails and other information in relation to the group. With my consent, this information will be stored as long as I am a member. Therefore, I accept the privacy policy from the Casal Les Quatre Barres.

pages.press.title: Press room
pages.press-articles.title: Press articles
pages.press-releases.title: Press releases
pages.workshops.title: Team-building workshops and kick-offs
pages.workshops.intro-card.body: **Castellers d’Estocolm** offers **team-building workshops and kick-offs** based on the Catalan tradition of *castells* — human towers that embody **trust, coordination and shared success**. Give your team a unique opportunity to reach new heights!
pages.workshops.who-card.title: Who are we and what are human towers?
pages.workshops.who-card.body-1: Castellers d’Estocolm is a group of Swedish, Catalan and international members united by the goal of building human towers (*castells*). We hold regular performances, such as at Kulturfestivalen in Stockholm.
pages.workshops.who-card.body-2: Human towers are a tradition from Catalonia dating back over 200 years, recognised as UNESCO Intangible Cultural Heritage of Humanity. Towers are formed by people standing on the shoulders of one another with strong support to create safe, secure and spectacular demonstrations of what humans are capable of when they work together.
pages.workshops.values-card.title: Human towers values
pages.workshops.values-card.value-1.body: The solid foundation of team success.
pages.workshops.values-card.value-2.body: Equality and harmony of the team.
pages.workshops.values-card.value-3.body: Daring to achieve something new together.
pages.workshops.values-card.value-4.body: Learning, adapting and growing as a group.
pages.workshops.offer-card.title: Our team-building workshops and kick-offs
pages.workshops.offer-card.body-1: We want to share the unique traditions and values of human towers with **your team**! Our workshops guide teams in building their own human towers in a **safe, fun and empowering way**. When constructing human towers, **every team member is essential**.
pages.workshops.offer-card.body-2: So give your team or kick-off event a unique, practical and cultural experience that they won’t forget!
pages.workshops.expectations-card.title: What to expect
pages.workshops.expectations-card.body-1: At all of our workshops, our experienced facilitators will first give your team an **introduction of around 30-45 minutes**, focusing on the history and different types of human towers, how they are constructed and deconstructed, as well as important safety information.
pages.workshops.expectations-card.body-2: After this, your team will have **between 75 and 90 minutes to try out constructing and supporting their own human towers**, always with close supervision and support from us. All ages and level of physical ability have a role to play, so every team member will be able to make a hands-on contribution to building a tower in a position they feel comfortable with.
pages.workshops.expectations-card.body-3: Our workshops typically last two hours, but the duration can be flexible depending on your needs.
pages.workshops.choose-card.title: Why choose us?
pages.workshops.choose-card.list.point-1: **Experienced facilitators from Castellers d'Estocolm** will attend your workplace (within Stockholms län) to guide and support your team to build human towers together.
pages.workshops.choose-card.list.point-2: Carefully crafted workshops for groups of all sizes, with safety our top priority.
pages.workshops.choose-card.list.point-3: Workshops are **offered in Swedish and English**.
pages.workshops.choose-card.list.point-4: A great way to strengthen team spirit, improve communication and celebrate success together.
pages.workshops.choose-card.list.point-5: A memorable, energising experience your team won’t forget!
pages.workshops.pricing-card.title: Pricing
pages.workshops.pricing-card.body-1: Our workshops are great value and we would be happy to discuss pricing on request. Get in touch with us to let us know your team’s needs and we’ll give you an affordable quote!
pages.workshops.pricing-card.body-2: **Help your team rise higher than they thought possible through teamwork, combined skills and great fun! Book your workshop or kick-off event today.**
pages.workshops.pricing-card.grid-locati: We can arrange the workshop anywhere in Stockholms län.
pages.performances.title: Witness the spectacle of human towers
pages.performances.subtitle: A unique live performance
pages.performances.intro-card.body-1: Experience the breathtaking Catalan tradition of human towers in Stockholm!
pages.performances.intro-card.body-2: Castellers d’Estocolm bring the **thrill and beauty of human towers** to any event. Our expert team creates **stunning structures** — from elegant pillars to tall towers — all built live before your eyes with optional Catalan musical accompaniment. If you want to give your event a unique jaw-dropping performance, get in touch with us!
pages.performances.choose-card.title: Reasons to book a performance with us
pages.performances.choose-card.list.poin: Far more than just a show, our performance of human towers offers.
A dramatic, unique highlight for celebrations and corporate events of all kinds.
Entertainment that captivates and enchants spectators of all ages.
A breathtaking spectacle that creates unforgettable memories.
A cultural experience from Catalonia showcasing the values of **strength, balance, courage and wisdom**.
Performances can be paired with traditional Catalan music and storytelling for a full cultural experience.
pages.performances.pricing-card.title: Pricing
pages.performances.pricing-card.body-1: Our performances are great value, but prices vary depending on the type of performance, dates, etc. As a guide, a performance of three full human towers with more than one person on each "floor" starts from 10.000 SEK. For smaller performances of pillars (one person on each "floor"), prices start from 1.000 SEK.
pages.performances.pricing-card.body-2: Get in touch with us to discuss your needs and we will provide you with a very affordable quote.
pages.performances.pricing-card.body-3: **Our performances bring awe-inspiring entertainment to any event.** Let us amaze your audience with human towers that show the very best of courage, strength, teamwork and cultural tradition. **Book a performance today!**
pages.performances.pricing-card.grid-loc: We can arrange the workshop anywhere in Stockholms län. Cold weather requires a covered area with a height of at least 6 metres.
pages.performances.pricing-card.grid-dat: Full experience with maximum participants on holidays, smaller performances possible on weekdays.
